data.description: Christina Bobb and Evan Corcoran face scrutiny over their communications with the justice department, legal experts sayTwo lawyers for Donald Trump could become witnesses or targets in the obstruction investigation connected to the criminal probe of the former presidents unauthorized retention of highly-sensitive government documents at his Mar-a-Lago resort in Florida, according to legal experts.The lawyers  Christina Bobb and Evan Corcoran face becoming ensnared in the investigation because they liaised with the justice department during the governments months-long effort to...
